title: Anyone know this font?
content:
This type escapes me, particularly because of the tilted "e"! I thought it was from the Garamond family but the serif on the "p" isn't quite right. Does anyone know what this font is? Thanks!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120415212233im_/http:/typophile.com/files/APlaceForMom_logoweb_6092.jpg)
author: deseynerseye
